title: Mullaitivu District Citizen’s Front members meet President Rajapaksa
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by: Sudath Silva) Representatives of the Mullaitivu District Citizen Front met President Mahinda Rajapaksa at Temple Trees on 03 March to discuss the major concerns and grievances of the people in the Mullaitivu district. This meeting was arranged by former journalist turned politician J. Sri Ranga MP….
